TopicTitle: Well I'll be damned, KSP is Famous!

Articles.Content:
I was literally just watching the 0.90 trailer and then quickly flicked onto BBC news because im at work and looks more official like, I then come across an article about how the basic idea of space travel, trade and combat are THE up and coming genre. KSP made it in there!

Nothing particularly exciting but It's the first thing I've seen with anything even remotely Kerbal about it.

Here

Tweety

PS. I'm deeply upset that I will not be home for the holiday season and probably wont have a chance to play 0.90 before the new year

Nice find, Tweety

And cheer up, the holidays are a great time to be doing a lot of fun stuff, and KSP will still be waiting for you in 2015

I think Mr Anthony is wide of the mark in saying that realistic physics would crush the player's freedom. It's true that not all games should be "about" the physics as KSP is, but there are cleverer ways of tackling it than just making up the behaviour out of whole cloth.

But, his game. I'd have to see how it plays.

I saw that too.

But then I'm someone waiting for elite to come out so I can regain the lost joys of being young and blasting around the cosmos in a mk3 cobra

then fail my exams again because I've spent the last 5 days playing.....

Boris

Theres more to KSP than physics... theres wibbley wobbley rockets too

Didn't realise Elite Dangerous was due out tomorrow, that might mean me parking KSP for a while. Too young for the original Elite but loved Fronteer, also a big fan of the X series which for me carried on where Elite left off.
Rather large article and only one sentence about KSP. Other games got whole paragraphs.
Awesome. Perhaps this may increase sales in SOME way?
Don't worry about not being able to play. You'll avoid the inevitable bugs which will be patched by the time you get to play.

Don't worry about not being able to play. You'll avoid the inevitable bugs which will be patched by the time you get to play.

Not necessarily. Version .25 had some rather glaring bugs and it didn't even get a patch for those.
